name: Fracked
summary: THE AWARD-WINNING ACTION BLOCKBUSTER RETURNS...MORE EXPLOSIVE THAN EVER   Before nDreams’ critically acclaimed Synapse and the frenetic chaos of FRENZIES, there was Fracked. The original trailblazing VR action adventure that seamlessly collides relentless “run and cover” gunfights with free and fluid skiing and climbing. Uncompromising, audacious, and unashamedly stylish, Fracked grabs VR by the Touch Controllers to deliver a truly ass-kicking virtual reality experience!
